name: Finding: Dwight
description:
> STAY SANE

The goal of Finding:Dwight is to search an abandoned mine for Dwight Drews, a 7 year old boy who went missing five months ago. While the mine is dark and your lighter spends just enough light to barely see your feet you lose sanity with each step you take - luckily the mine worker left some lamps in there before leaving.

> HOW TO PLAY

To interact with objects press the highlighted keys, try to stay in the light to regain your sanity.

> WARNING

Some users experienced motion sickness due to rapid camera movement. An option to turn this off will be included in a future build once the rating period stopped.
Stay sane!

> CREDITS

Code/Art: mawal, Riodsh

Made for the Scream Jam 2020
